Class MonteCarlo.Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • MonteCarlo.Node
  • Enclosing class:
    MonteCarlo
    private class MonteCarlo.Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Node of the tree stores a state, total visits, and an integer value representing win probability.

      • Node

        private Node​(Board board,
             int val,
             int opp)
        creates a new node that is a child of one of the branches off of root
        Parameters:
        board - whatever board setup this node represents
        val - integer representation of the MCTS player
        opp - integer representation of the human player

      • Node

        private Node​(Board board,
             int val,
             int opp,
             int col)
        Creates a new branch off of root
        Parameters:
        board - whatever board setup this node represents
        val - integer representation of the MCTS player
        opp - integer representation of the human player
        col - column of play this node represents

    • Method Detail

      • getAllStatesFromRoot

        private void getAllStatesFromRoot()
        Links all possible plays to this node

      • getAllStates

        private void getAllStates()
        Get all states but do not pay attention to column of play

      • calculateUCT

        public double calculateUCT()
        Calculate upper confidence bound given by w/n + C sqrt{ln(N)/n}
        Returns:
        upper confidence bound

      • returnBestUCT

        private MonteCarlo.Node returnBestUCT()
        Iterates through all child nodes searching for highest UCT value
        Returns:
        the child node with the highest UCT value

      • rollout

        private int rollout​(int[][] board,
                    int[] height)
        Simulates a random game from a given position
        Parameters:
        board - two dimensional array representing the board
        height - array that keeps track of how much space is left per column
        Returns:
        +1 if a win, -1 if a loss, 0 if a draw

      • setWinValue

        private void setWinValue​(int win)
        Setter method to increment or decrement win value
        Parameters:
        win - +1 for a win, -1 for a loss

      • setParent

        private void setParent​(MonteCarlo.Node parent)
        Setter method that links this node to its parent node
        Parameters:
        parent - the node that should be above this object in the tree

      • getParent

        private MonteCarlo.Node getParent()
        Accessor method to return parent node
        Returns:
        parent node

      • educatedRandom

        private int educatedRandom​(int[][] board,
                           int[] height)
        Returns random open column as long as a win is not possible
        Parameters:
        board - two dimensional array representation of the board to be played on
        height - current heights of each column on the board
        Returns:
        column that should be played, otherwise random number

      • isLeaf

        private boolean isLeaf()
        Tells whether or not this node has undergone node expansion
        Returns:
        true if this node has no children

      • getColumn

        private int getColumn()
        Accessor method for the column that this node assumes the ai plays
        Returns:
        integer representing the column that this node added a piece to

      • getBoard

        private int[][] getBoard()
        Accessor method to return the board
        Returns:
        two dimensional array representation of the state of this node

      • getHeights

        private int[] getHeights()
        Accessor method to return the height
        Returns:
        one dimensional array representation of the state of this board

      • getTotalVisits

        private int getTotalVisits()
        Accessor method for total visits to this node
        Returns:
